name: Project Zanyedba
description:
OVERVIEW: 

In this top-down shooter, you stand alone with a repurposed laser tool to fight off the unending hoards of radioactive slime monsters. Some may aim for you, and some may split into pieces, but all are deadly. Fight for as long as you can to improve your score.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Controls - WASD to move,  Space to shoot

Objective - Survive for as long as possible while killing as many monsters with your laser as possible to raise your high score.

CREDITS:

Director - Alex D.

Programming Lead - Higgins

Design Lead - Liam B.

Sound Lead - James K.

Art Lead - Hunter E.
